description:
Mark just turned 19 and he is from the DEEP south. I met him online...
"I spend a lot of time on the Internet," he said. "I live in a real small town and there ain't much to do..."
He'd never left home before and after I had chatted with him online for a while he decided that he was up for the adventure!
When I finally met him the first thing I noticed was how soft-spoken he is. He's very shy and has a hard time looking at you directly when he speaks. I think he might have just been overwhelmed by the new experience!
The shyness just adds to his cuteness, though, and his smooth, toned body is pretty nice too!
When he's not online, he likes to run and hunt.
As he put it: "Go huntin', fishin', stuff like that..."
"What do you hunt?"
"Deer, ducks, rabbits, squirrels, whatever..."
"So you're an outdoors kind of guy?"
"Yeah, definitely..."
"So do you eat them or do you just go shoot them?"
"Oh, I eat 'em too..."
At the end of his visit, he had a big smile on his face, and seemed disappointed that he had to get on the plane.
Hopefully we can get him back for more!
title: Mark
